creator: senlee@crimsonlogic.com.sg
text:
Hi

the following error was encountered when we ran our programs.

Have check that the files exist and the classpath is set correctly.

For some unknow reason, it is able to locate the class but not the method.

Pls advise.

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent: method <init>
(Ljava/lang/String;Lorg/apache/log4j/Category;Lorg/apache/log4j/Priority;Ljava/l
ang/String;Ljava/lang/Throwable;)V not found
	at sun.security.provider.Sun.<clinit>(Sun.java)
	at org.apache.log4j.Category.info(Category.java:705)
	at com.sns.util.logging.LogPrinter.info(LogPrinter.java:30)
	at com.sns.legal.efs.frontend.util.EFSPrint.show(EFSPrint.java:47)
	at com.sns.legal.efs.frontend.EFSFEServlet.init(EFSFEServlet.java:41)
	at javax.servlet.GenericServlet.init(GenericServlet.java:266)
	at 
com.netscape.server.servlet.servletrunner.ServletRepository.loadServlet
(ServletRepository.java:336)

(ServletRepository.java:372)

rictHeaders(PlatformHttpServletResponse.ja

(PlatformRequestDispatcher.java:68)

	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:840)

(ServletInfo.java:78)

(ServletRunner.java:433)
	at 
com.netscape.server.servlet.platformhttp.PlatformHttpServletResponse.callUri
(PlatformHttpServletResponse.java:1059)

rictHeaders(PlatformHttpServletResponse.ja
	at 
com.netscape.server.servlet.platformhttp.PlatformRequestDispatcher.include
(PlatformRequestDispatcher.java:68)

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: I suggest you rebuild your all your classes from scratch.
